glsa.title: Shadow: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Shadow, the worst of which might allow privilege escalation.

background.p: Shadow is a set of tools to deal with user accounts.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Shadow. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition, gain privileges via crafted input, or SIGKILL arbitrary processes.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Shadow users should upgrade to the latest version:
